ygData.subject: RE: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: From: David Knadler  ... Yeah I couldnt believe it when I saw it myself.  The funny thing was, last night I was in a group,we had to go
ygData.messageBody:
From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

>I agree... that original poster has to be one of the luckiest bards in
>Norrath. I've been _religiously_ auctioning for the MM drum for the past 5
>levels. Not a single response, word, hint, tease, etc, etc. Seriously, I

Yeah I couldnt believe it when I saw it myself. The funny thing was, last
night I was in a group,we had to go somewhere, I threw on speed and twisted
a str song to ease their encumberment, I still smoked them. I had to stop a
lot so they could keep up.

-Orchestro
